bio:
Ruowen Tan is a recitation Instructor at NYU Shanghai. He has B.S in Chemical Engineering and M.S in Computer Science from NYU Tandon School of Engineering.

Ruowen's interests are in large scale automated process control. Before becoming a recitation instructor at NYU Shanghai, Ruowen was a computer science tutor at Polytechnic Tutoring Center for two years. He was also a winner of HackNYU 2017.
